long_description: 686 Mannual Anna insulated jacket for girls provides your snow girl with stylish splendor, solid warmth and waterproof, breathable protection while she plays, skis or boards her heart out this winter. Durable polyester shell with INFIDRY-5(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and taped critical seams offers great weather protection. Polyester insulation traps heat for cozy warmth all day long; it insulates even when damp. Youth Evolution sleeves extend 1.5 in. to keep up with your child's growth for the next season. Attached hood; front stormflap; soft chin guard; handwarmer pockets; adjustable powder skirt; rip-and-stick cuffs.
short_description: 686 Mannual Anna insulated jacket for girls provides your snow girl with stylish splendor, solid warmth and waterproof, breathable protection while she plays, skis or boards her heart out this winter.
